Has a 75% chance of removing all debuffs from all allies. 

Places a [Block Debuffs] buff and a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

skills.desc: Revives a target ally with 40% HP and 50% Turn Meter, then places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff and a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on that ally for 2 turns.
skills.name: Sprouting Season

skills.desc:
Heals each ally by 10% of their MAX HP at the start of their turn. 

Places a [Perfect Veil] buff for 1 turn on the ally with the lowest HP at the end of this Champion's turn.
skills.name: Leaf Shroud [P]
